means: 贬值，跌价，减价( depreciate的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: During those five years, the pound depreciated by a quarter.
Shares in the company have depreciated.
sentence.Network_cn: 该公司的股票已经贬值.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Use of the depreciated value ., 使用中发生的折旧价值.
depreciate 磨损, depreciated 计提, depreciate 贬损
Assets classified as held for sale are not depreciated or amortized., 资产当做拿着分类因为售卖不被贬值或分期偿还.

list.abs: depreciation cost 折旧费depreciation fund 折旧基金-
会计分录中英文对照表_百度知道 ... Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu 德勤 depreciable life 折旧年限 depreciation expense 折旧费用.
会计词汇D ... physical capital 有形资本 physical depreciation 实物折旧，有形损耗 physical holding of stock 实际库存.
会计财务术语中英文对照 -... ... depreciated value 折余价值 depreciation allowance 折旧提存 depreciation benefit 折旧好处.

entry.def: If something such as a currency depreciates or if something depreciates it, it loses some of its original value.

example.ex: Countries may also find their currency is depreciating in foreign markets.
example.tran: 一些国家也可能会发现自己的货币正在国外市场上贬值。

example.ex: The demand for foreign currency depreciates the real value of local currencies...
example.tran: 对外汇的需求致使本币的实际价值下跌。

auth_sentence.content: His property empire, slightly depreciated through his divorce settlement, is still standing.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: His property empire, slightly depreciated through his divorce settlement, is still standing.

auth_sentence.content: Before this Wilde depreciated pity as a motive in art; now he embraced it.
auth_sentence.res_content: Before this Wilde depreciated pity as a motive in art; now he embraced it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Before this Wilde depreciated pity as a motive in art; now he embraced it.

auth_sentence.content: Depreciated rental property is a common source of trouble, as are investments in hedge funds.
